Package main

Class Team

java.lang.Object
main.Team
public class Team extends Object
This is the Team class. This class handles the logic to provide a functioning team for the game. The team consists of players, reserves, and consumable items. It allows adding, selling, and replacing Athletes, as well as buying and selling consumable Items. The Team's ability to play is determined by the number of players and their injury status. The Team can also restore the stamina of its players. Each Team has a unique name.
Author:
Yunu Cho, Kush Desai

      Constructs a new Team object with the given name.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Athlete player)
      Adds an Athlete to the Team's player mapping, used to add players into the opponent Team.
      Parameters:
      player - the Athlete to be added to the team

    • addReserves

      public void addReserves(Athlete player)
      Adds a reserve Athlete to the Team's reserves list.
      Parameters:
      player - the Athlete to be added as a reserve

    • buyPlayer

      public void buyPlayer(Athlete player)
      Buys an Athlete by adding them to the Team's reserves list.
      Parameters:
      player - the Athlete to be bought and added to the reserves

    • sellPlayer

      public void sellPlayer(Athlete player)
      Sells an Athlete by removing them from the Team's reserves list.
      Parameters:
      player - the Athlete to be sold and removed from the reserves

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(Athlete player)
      Removes an Athlete from the Team's player mapping and adds them to the reserves. Only used in team setup to ensure that the player has an otherwise full team.
      Parameters:
      player - the Athlete to be removed from the Team and added to the reserves

    • replacePlayer

      public void replacePlayer(Athlete in, Athlete out)
      Replaces an Athlete in the Team's player mapping with another Athlete. The replaced Athlete is added to the reserves.
      Parameters:
      in - the Athlete to be added to the team
      out - the Athlete to be removed from the team and added to the reserves

    • buyConsumable

      public void buyConsumable(Item consumable)
      Purchases a consumable Item by adding it to the Team's consumables list.
      Parameters:
      consumable - the Item to be bought and added to the consumables

    • canPlay

      public boolean canPlay()
      Checks if the Team can play a game. A Team can play if it has exactly 5 players and none of them are injured.
      Returns:
      true if the Team can play, false otherwise

    • getTeamName

      public String getTeamName()
      Retrieves the Team name.
      Returns:
      the Team name

    • getPlayersMap

      public HashMap<Athlete.POSITION,Athlete> getPlayersMap()
      Retrieves the mapping of player positions to Athlete objects in the Team.
      Returns:
      the player mapping

    • getPlayersArray

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getPlayersArray()
      Retrieves the list of player Athletes in the Team.
      Returns:
      the list of players

    • getReserves

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getReserves()
      Retrieves the list of reserve Athletes in the Team.
      Returns:
      the list of reserves

    • getItems

      public ArrayList<Item> getItems()
      Retrieves the list of consumable Items held by the Team.
      Returns:
      the list of consumables

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(Item item)
      Removes a consumable Item from the Team's consumables list.
      Parameters:
      item - the Item to be removed from the consumables

    • restoreStamina

      public void restoreStamina()
      Restores the stamina of all Athletes in the Team. This method sets the current stamina of each Athlete to their maximum stamina.
